110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Ted,
I apologize I have been out of pocket these last few days. Enclosed you will find some information that you may find helpful regarding MBO.
Link to our benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefitsLink to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdfLink to the most common types of non-billable expenses you can submit to us: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdfOur Full Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf
Please let me know the best time to reach you and we can discuss further.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
Ted,
I apologize I have been out of pocket these last few days. Enclosed you will find some information that you may find helpful regarding MBO.
From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Tuesday, August 09, 2011 11:28 AM To: 'tedbissell@hotmail.com' Subject: RE: Ted Bissell
Ted,
Thank you. Seems like I will not be able to step out of this meeting.
Steve
From: tedbissell@hotmail.com [mailto:tedbissell@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, August 08, 2011 9:01 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: Ted Bissell
Steve, No problem! No hurry.... We can talk Wed. as well, if tomorrow is hectic ...:) Thanks, Ted Sent from myTouch 4G ----- Reply message ----- From: "Steve Arhancet" <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: "&apos;tedbissell@hotmail.com&apos;" <tedbissell@hotmail.com> Subject: Ted Bissell Date: Mon, Aug 8, 2011 5:46 pm
Ted,
I am caught up at the gym and will unfortunately not be able to make our call at 9pm EST. I will call you in the morning. I am sorry for the change in schedule.
Steve
